name: Ghana - Low Effort - #WCGHN1
description:
This mint is a low effort painting of the flag of Ghana.

It is made up of the Colors Red, Gold and Green with a Black Star.

thr33som3s and the Grotto love spectacle, and there are very few global celebrations more spectacular than soccer's World Cup.   Through a month-long celebration, thr33som3s asks his collectors to consider who they really are, why they collect his work, what they want his work to become, and what they are willing to do to collect it.   Collector choices via blockchain, coupled with the chaotic outcome of real life sport will determine what will happen with each piece.

To kick off the 3v3nt, thr33som3s minted 32 individually hand-painted tokens to represent the 32 countries pursuing the World Cup. Though minted on a separate madn3ss wallet, these tokens are offical thr33som3s and, as such, will have Future Utility.

This mint is an individually conceived and hand painted piece.

******* digital capture of original painting, gouache on vintage baseball card, 2022. ******* NFT image is for personal use, no commercial rights are granted. Twitter @thr33som3s and IG @thr33somes to see upcoming paintings and new series. ************
